arStrings.szText: Dash onto an enemy and slash them.

{c_important}Shred{/c} gains {c_number}[{SF_16}*100|%+|]{/c} Attack Speed and Heals for {c_number}[{SF_8}*100|%|]{/c} of your Maximum Life {c_number}([PlayerHealthMax() * SF_8]){/c} if an enemy is struck.
{c_important}Shred's{/c} second and third attacks also perform a dash. In addition, {c_important}Shred's{/c} Critical Strike Damage is increased by {c_number}[{SF_5}*100|%x|]{/c}.
{c_important}Shred's{/c} third combo attack is larger and applies an additional {c_number}{dot:MOD_B_POISONDOT}{/c} Poisoning damage over {c_number}{SF_7}{/c} seconds.
